# MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.dropShadow

**Case**

An edge makes the text appear to float above the background.

## Declaration

```swift
case dropShadow
```

## Constants

- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.undefined**: An edge style has not been specified.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.none**: The text should not have a styled edge.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.raised**: An edge makes the text appear to rise above the background.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.depressed**: An edge makes the text appear pushed in.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.uniform**: A thin outline lies along the edge of the text.
